text: Believe you can and you're halfway there. — Theodore Roosevelt
Your limitation—it's only your imagination.
Push yourself, because no one else is going to do it for you.
Great things never come from comfort zones.
Dream it. Wish it. Do it.
Success doesn’t just find you. You have to go out and get it.
The harder you work for something, the greater you’ll feel when you achieve it.
Dream bigger. Do bigger.
Don’t stop when you’re tired. Stop when you’re done.
Wake up with determination. Go to bed with satisfaction.
Do something today that your future self will thank you for.
Little things make big days.
It’s going to be hard, but hard does not mean impossible.
Don’t wait for opportunity. Create it.
Sometimes we’re tested not to show our weaknesses, but to discover our strengths.
The key to success is to focus on goals, not obstacles.
Dream it. Believe it. Build it.
Success is what comes after you stop making excuses.
Don’t watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
Great things never come from comfort zones.
Your only limit is your mind.
Be stronger than your excuses.
Work hard in silence. Let success make the noise.
Don’t limit your challenges. Challenge your limits.
Doubt kills more dreams than failure ever will.
Discipline is doing what needs to be done, even if you don’t want to.
Opportunities don’t happen. You create them.
Push harder than yesterday if you want a different tomorrow.
Don’t be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
Do what you can with all you have, wherever you are.
It always seems impossible until it’s done. — Nelson Mandela
The secret to getting ahead is getting started.
Keep going. Everything you need will come to you at the perfect time.
You are capable of more than you know.
Don’t let yesterday take up too much of today.
Fall seven times and stand up eight.
You don’t have to be perfect to be amazing.
Strive for progress, not perfection.
Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
Don’t be pushed by your problems. Be led by your dreams.
Small steps every day lead to big results.
Do it with passion or not at all.
Stay positive, work hard, make it happen.
Your dreams don’t work unless you do.
The best time for new beginnings is now.
It’s not whether you get knocked down, it’s whether you get up. — Vince Lombardi
Hard work beats talent when talent doesn’t work hard.
If you can dream it, you can do it.
Great things never come from comfort zones.
Don’t wait. The time will never be just right.
Work while they sleep. Learn while they party. Save while they spend. Live like they dream.
Do more of what makes you happy.
When you feel like quitting, think about why you started.
Do something today that your future self will thank you for.
The best view comes after the hardest climb.
Believe in yourself and you will be unstoppable.
Hard times don’t create heroes. It is during the hard times when the ‘hero’ within us is revealed.
Stay hungry. Stay foolish. — Steve Jobs
Dare to begin.
What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
You miss 100% of the shots you don’t take. — Wayne Gretzky
If you’re going through hell, keep going. — Winston Churchill
Believe in your infinite potential.
Your future is created by what you do today, not tomorrow.
Make each day your masterpiece.
Don’t let fear decide your future.
Do what you love and you’ll never work a day in your life.
You didn’t come this far only to come this far.
Believe in the magic of beginnings.
Hustle in silence and let your success be the noise.
Keep moving forward.
If you want it, work for it.
Doubt kills more dreams than failure ever will.
Be so good they can’t ignore you. — Steve Martin
Work until your idols become your rivals.
Don’t tell people your plans. Show them your results.
Difficult roads often lead to beautiful destinations.
Go the extra mile. It’s never crowded.
Prove them wrong.
Focus on the step in front of you, not the whole staircase.
Be the energy you want to attract.
Life is short. Do stuff that matters.
Don’t be afraid to fail. Be afraid not to try.
Learn from yesterday. Live for today. Hope for tomorrow.
Turn your wounds into wisdom.
Make yourself a priority.
A little progress each day adds up to big results.
If it doesn’t challenge you, it doesn’t change you.
Do it scared.
Keep going, you’re getting there.
If not now, when?
You are your only limit.
Don’t stop until you’re proud.
The pain you feel today will be the strength you feel tomorrow.
Your vibe attracts your tribe.
Never give up. Great things take time.
Work for it more than you hope for it.
